alert.note: Alert for Austin; Grimes; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Austin, southwestern Grimes, southeastern Washington and northwestern Waller Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1046 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Industry, or 8 miles south of Brenham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brenham, Hempstead, Bellville, Pine Island and Industry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Texas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
